bibl.title: An Amphora with a Graeco-Nubian Inscription found at Dongola.
bibl.note: Edition of an amphora with dipinto found in the room 44 in the building I in Dongola [Inv. Add.10.214]. This document contributes to the picture of social and commercial life in the Makurian capital in the twelfth-fourteenth century.

bibl.title: Nubian Voices. Studies in Christian Nubian Culture

bibl.seg: Katarzyna Danys-Lasek & Adam Łajtar, An Amphora with a Graeco-Nubian Inscription found at Dongola.

Adam Łajtar & Jacques van der Vliet (edd.), with the assistance of Grzegorz Ochała & Giovanni Ruffini, Nubian Voices. Studies in Christian Nubian Culture = The Journal of Juristic Papyrology. Supplements. Volume XV (Warsaw, 2011) pp. 3-13, 3 figg.

Edition of an amphora with dipinto found in the room 44 in the building I in Dongola [Inv. Add.10.214]. This document contributes to the picture of social and commercial life in the Makurian capital in the twelfth-fourteenth century.
